system.description:
Choose an Incantation Skill

Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.C63jPLVFm4iUGNLT]{Reciter (Chosen Skill)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.tpiMkpAl4IjNwQtv]{Speaker (Chosen Skill)}, and Incantation (Chosen Skill) 12 ranks

Benefit

When creating incantation recipes in the selected skill, the IP cost is reduced by 5

Special

This feat stacks with any other incantation recipe cost reduction feats. This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time it is taken, it applies to a different incantation skill.
